Job Description:
Personal Assistant is responsible for performing secretarial work and provide senior managers with day-to-day administrative support. The duties include answering phone calls and managing correspondence, scheduling appointments, and making travel arrangements. The duties may also be required to organize events.

I. Job Description:
- Assist the Executive Director in the timely management of communications including written, telephone, email, and voicemail.
- Support the Executive Director by providing a high standard of personal executive level assistance to meet the needs of the Executive Director’s objectives, including a significant amount of diary management, setting up meetings, hospitality, travel, and visa arrangements.
- Manage and coordinate travel for both business and personal arrangements.
- Implementing and maintaining procedures/administrative systems.
- Managing internal and external correspondence on behalf of senior management.
- Preparing communications on behalf of senior management.
- Support in coordination of projects by capturing timelines, strategies, and delivering progress updates.
- Other tasks as assigned by Executive Director.
Job Requirement:
- Previous experience in a customer engagement, Personal Assistant, Secretary or similar role.
- Creative problem solving, outstanding organizational, and time management skills.
- Ability to speak effectively among executives, clients, customers, and employees.
- Ability to resolve complex administrative problems independently and perform other tasks that are diverse and advanced.
- Can speak Thai is a plus.
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Company Profile: The Sauber Group is in its core a Cambodian company and proud of its roots. As it is also a joint venture between Cambodia, Thailand and Germany, it will stress the strengths of each culture to create a unique company culture.The company credo is to turn standard processes and services into outstanding experiences for our customers. It clearly targets to disrupt markets and to grow aggressively and profitable.Sauber aims to become a conglomerate of businesses which can be aggressively multiplied all over Cambodia. Ultimately, the target is to go public with a strong and recognized brand.At the core of the business is the idea to connect traditional trade with E Commerce in a multi-channel system. Classical market approaches such as the development of Sauber Mini Malls are combined with alternative sales channels like E commerce, direct sales for B2B and telesales. With Cambodia as its home base, it is the target to expand into other countries in the region as well when the conditions are right.

Job Description: •	ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅកាន់អតិថិជន និងសាធារណៈជន•	ស្វែងរកអតិថិជនគោលដៅ•	រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ និងប្រចាំថ្ងៃ•	សិក្សានិងវាយតម្លៃទៅលើសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន•	បំពេញបែបបទ និងសំណុំឯកសារផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងជាមួយសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន•	រៀបចំឯកសារសំណើសុំឥណទានដាក់ជូនគណៈកម្មការដើម្បីអនុម័តឥណទាន•	ផ្ដល់ជូនព័ត៌មានទាក់ទងជាមួយសំណើសុំឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន នៅពេលដែលគណៈកម្មការឥណទានមានចម្ងល់•	ធ្វើការជូនដំណឹងដល់អតិថិជនពីថ្ងៃបើកប្រាក់ និងបង់ប្រាក់•	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាអតិថិជនដែលសងកម្ចីយឺតយ៉ាវ•	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហារបស់អតិថិជនទាក់ទងជាមួយនឹងឥណទាន•	គ្រប់គ្រងឯកសារឥណទាន•	ធ្វើររបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្ទាល់•	ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការស្នើសុំរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement: •	មានសញ្ញាបត្រ ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែក ធនាគារ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គណនេយ្យ គ្រប់គ្រង ទីផ្សារ ឬជំនាញប្រហាក់ប្រហែល•	ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារដែលទាក់ទងជាមួយវិស័យធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬវិស័យស្រដៀងយ៉ាងតិច ៦ខែ•	ត្រូវមានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ•	ត្រូវមានការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អនៅក្នុងក្រុមការងារ និងសាធារណៈជន•	មានភាពឯករាជ្យក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ និងសេចក្ដីសម្រេចចិត្ត•	ត្រូវមានមធ្យោបាយធ្វើដំណើរផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន•	អាចចុះបំពេញបេសកកម្មការងារនៅតាមបណ្ដារខេត្តផ្សេងៗ ក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា•	មានចំណេះដឹងកុំព្យូទ័រច្បាស់លាស់ ជាពិសេស កម្មវិធី Ms.Outlook, Ms. Power Point, Ms.Excel និង Ms. Word

Job Description:
• To assist in recording, balancing of inventory and related functions.
• To assist in recording account payable and financial Analysis and Cost Review.
• To assist in doing stores & warehouse inventory variance.
• Annual Tax Submission and monthly quarterly tax return.
• Liaise with Auditor and Tax Agent.
• To assist in daily accounting department functions as assigned.
Job Requirement:
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Khmer.
• Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.
• Ability to work patiently under pressure.
• Good interpersonal skills, accountable, initiative driven, and proactive.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Education and Experience:
• Diploma or Bachelors Degree in accounting or related field required.
• Minimum one year of experience in Accounting/ Finance is compulsory or similar relevant position required

Information:

Job Description:  Ensure that provincial annual plan of action and budget are effectively implemented and reach to the target. Promote and implement money transfer and payment products and services to potential agents, potential and target clients. Promote and offering on ground training to agents/staff about Ly Hour product and service, policy and procedure. Ensure effective and quality recruitment of agent, good customer services across the region and building strong relationship with agent. Lead and manage sales planning, sales team and activities to achieve regional sales goals, transaction volume and number of agent, as well as sales management. Conduct and develops sale & promotion campaign plans as to activate awareness of Ly hour product and services. Drive targeting, sales strategy as well as to stimulate new account growth, existing account activation, transaction utilization and retention. Compile competitor’s activities and propose action plan Produce the weekly and monthly reports to Manager
Job Requirement: 1. Bachelor degree in Business Administration, Marketing or related field2. At least 3 years in sales & marketing management experience from MFI, Bank or Fintech sector…3. Able to work independently with strong sense of accountability and professionalism4. Be result-oriented, initiative, creative, positive, problem-solving, high commitment and team player5. Able to travel and station at province.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Reviewing IT audit planning, define key risk concerns, and conduct IT internal audit mission with IT IAO
• Taking lead of the individual internal audit team in each audit as well as full support to the IT IAO
• Supervision and monitoring of IT audit works performed by the team members and consolidate IT internal audit report
• Maximizing effectiveness of the IT audit results through participation in the management meeting – debriefing
• Actively involved in controlling the IT department under own responsibilities with respect to risks management, cost control management, business and controls risks – any particular worrying issues pertaining to these should be brought to the attention of the IAD/IT IAM, then meeting with MJQ’s senior management for solutions
• Provide training to the team members when deem necessary, provide effective coaching to ensure effective knowledge exchange and internal audit quality in its process and output
• Ensure that all audit activities are monitored and its status be tracked against individual IT audit plan – audit commencement date, completion date of the IT audit field works, meeting notes etc.
• Ensure that all IT working practices at all stages are in line with the approved Internal Audit Policies in term of quality control procedures, sampling procedures, audit testing procedures etc.
• Assist to design IT IA policy, procedure and guideline for IT IA team to implement effectively
• Actively involved in discussion of audit findings and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- audit corrections process and give recommendation for changes
• Ensure suggestions for more efficient and effective identification/IT audit procedures of material gaps under area of responsibilities
• Identify the weaknesses and risks in IT infra-structure, servers and database.
• Provide security best practice to IT Infra-structure, servers and database to prevent security breaches.
• Initiate internal controls document to ensure key risk in IT department are identifying and testing.
• Other tasks assigned by the IAD/IT IAM
Job Requirement:
• A minimum university degree in IT. IIA understanding or Master of IT degree is an advantage.
• About 1 years of experience in the leadership role or 3 years of experience of IT audit
• At least 3 years of IT audit experience (Information system governance, Infra-structure security, severs security hardening, database security hardening)
• Certified Ethical Hacker is preferred.
• Knowledge of Information Technologies Standard Framework.
• Good analysis and troubleshooting system in Firewall
• Knowledge of database and software for query report such as SQL, VBA,… is an advantage
• Knowledge of IT and system project is preferable
• Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings
• Good written and spoken English, as well as communication and interpersonal skills
• High motivation and ability to work without supervision.

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Do data collection and draft planning including sampling of a department and submit for Sr. Internal Audit Officer review
• Conduct internal audit mission at a department and ensure high quality of the audit conduct
• Provide immediate recommendation as the result of both the compliances, risk and operational audits
• Draft internal audit report on own findings and report to the Sr. CIAO and communicate findings to auditee for comments
• Ensure constant capacity building and up-to-date of company group’s performance
• Focus on functions at campus level such as Aii Academic Services, Aii Academic Support Services, AIS Academic Support Services, Athletic Department, AIS Study Program, Support Services (Bursar, Administrative Office, Information Office, MJQ Library, MJQ Student Health Center, School Bus Services…) and so on.
• Other tasks required by the IAD/CIAS/Sr. CIAO.
Job Requirement:
• University degree in banking/finance, accounting, business or economics, preferably a specialized accounting degree.
• At least 1 year of experience in internal audit position or at least 2 years of experience of finance/account in the microfinance/banking/audit sector
• Good understanding of internal control and practices
• Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings
• The ability to use your own initiative
• Analytical thinking and attention to detail
• The ability to work effectively on your own and as part of a team
• Strong ethical standard and high levels of integrity
• Resilience under pressure
• Flexible thinking and ability to adapt to change
• Strong advance excel skill.


**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
- Creative Design on social media content artwork and video production
- Reviewing final layout and suggesting improvements if required.
- Assist on all marketing communication activities such as writing copy for all collaterals included promotional literature, brochures, leaflet, digital marketing, newsletters, and others.
- Monitor and coordinate the process for product demo, promotion, or any events.
- Liaising with external printers, suppliers on a regular basis to ensure deadlines.
- Promote company products and executes other task assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Design , Business Administration or marketing or other related fields
- 1-2 Years experience working as a graphic designer
- Good Communication
- Able to work with AI, Photoshop, Illustrator , design tool, ability to do photo and video editing is a plus
- Knowledge and understanding in social media platform.
- Good Time management skill and able to complete within deadline
- Knowledge or understanding of agriculture/ infrastructure equipment product is a plus.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description: Internal/External Interactions:   - Internal   • Reports to Talent Acquisition Manager    • All Units in MJQE - External   • Recruitment agency, supplier and so on   • University, NGOs and so on involve with education development programFunctional Responsibilities: - Coordinate with hiring managers to identify staffing needs - Determine selection criteria - Source potential candidates through online channels (e.g. social platforms and    professional networks) - Plan interview and selection procedures, including screening calls, assessments and in-    person interviews - Assess candidate information, including resumes and contact details - Prepared offer letter employment contract and other requirement document for new staff - Design job descriptions and interview questions that reflect each position’s    requirements - Lead employer branding initiatives - Organize and attend job fairs and recruitment events   Forecast quarterly and annual hiring needs by department - Foster long-term relationships with past applicants and potential candidates - Other tasks assigned by line manager.Travel Requirements:  - This position is based in head office. At times the position is scheduled to work in Units and regional level.
Job Requirement: - 03+ years’ experience as a Senior Talent Acquisition Officer or similar role- Familiarity with social media, resume databases and professional networks- Hands-on experience with full-cycle recruiting using various interview techniques and   evaluation methods- General knowledge of various employment laws and practices- Attention to detail about Application Tracking Database- Excellent verbal and written communication skills- A keen understanding of the differences between various roles within organizations.- Achieving Results – Results driven, able to make sound judgments over competing   priorities, use initiative and actively assess the course of action to set and   accomplish targets.- Strategic Thinking – Able to identify a vision along with the plans which need to be   implemented to meet the end goal, evaluating situations, decisions, issues in the short,   medium and long term.- Analytical Thinking – Able to simplify complex problems, processes or projects into   component parts and explore and evaluate them systematically.  - Flexibility – Adapts easily to change and responds flexibly to a changing and evolving   environment, provides momentum when driving change and involves others when building   plans for change.- Resilience - Ability to work under pressure and manage personal effectiveness in face of   challenge.  Demonstrates an approach to work that is characterized by commitment, energy   and motivation.- Teamwork – Able to build and maintain effective working relationships with a diverse and   multi-cultural workforce in a variety of locations, working cooperatively with others.    The ability to build and contribute to a team as well as work independently within a   given framework.- Communication – Strong communication, influencing and presentation skills both verbal   and written.  Able to get one’s message understood by adopting a range of styles, tools   and techniques appropriate to the audience.

Job Description: - Welcomes patients and visitors by greeting patients and visitors, in person or on the telephone, answering or referring inquires.- Keeps patient appointments on schedule by notifying provider of patient’s arrival; reviewing service delivery compared to schedule; reminding provider of service delays. - Comforts patients by anticipating patients’ anxieties, answering patients’ questions, maintaining the reception area.- Ensures availability of treatment information by filing and retrieving patient records.- Maintains patient accounts by obtaining, recording, and updating personal and financial information.- Obtains revenue by recording and updating financial information, recording and collecting patient charges; controlling credit extended to patients, filing, collecting.- Maintains business office inventory and equipment by checking stock to determine inventory   level; anticipating needed supplies; placing and expediting orders for supplies; verifying receipt of supplies; scheduling equipment service and repairs.- Protects patients’ rights by maintaining confidentiality of personal and financial information. -Maintains operations by following policies and procedures; reporting needed changes.- Other tasks will have assigned by Line Manger
Job Requirement: - Bachelor Degree or equivalent.- Experience in Clinic and Hospital at field Practices. - Good motivation team and with good communication.- Outstanding and sharing experience with good ethically - Good management and make good decision for Patient. - Accountable person and coordination for patient.- Good time management skills, good communication.- Knowledge of Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Email, Internet, WeChat, Telegram.

Job Description:
• Oversee daily operations.
• Enforce all workplace policies and procedures.
• Monitor patient’s condition and assess their needs to provide the best possible care and advice.
• Observe and interpret patient’s symptoms and communicate them to physicians.
• Recording patient’s vital signs and medication information and fill in patient’s charts.
• Adjust and administer patient’s medication and provide treatments according to physician’s order.
• Inspect the facilities and act to maintain excellent hygiene and safety (decontaminating equipment, sanitizing surfaces, preparing beds etc…).
• Provide instant medical care in emergencies.
• Check and maintain nursing supplies.
Job Requirement: • Diploma/Bachelor’s degree in nursing required.• 1-3 years nursing experiences.• Basic computer skills.• Experiences in home health care.• Experiences in emergency room or intensive care.• Ability to effectively communicate with patients, families, physician and staff.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564

and service quality standards by conducting ongoing evaluations and investigating complaints and initiate corrective actions;- Prepare financial reports for management that clearly explain operational effectiveness, trends and variances;- Liaise with superior to make decisions for operational activities and set strategic goals for Property Management;- Evaluate regularly the efficiency of business Job Description:
** Reporting Line: Transport Supervisor

** Key Responsibilities:
1. Risk Prevention
- Monitor fleet movement using CCTV footage
- Detect risky behavior, aggressive driving, and fraudulent practices, and take immediate action to stop the event and report to supervisor/transporters.
- Analyzed triggered events on system and take immediate actions with Transporters/ Drivers.
- Coordinate with Transporters in maintaining updated Driver list.
- Register new zones, and drivers into System.
- Coordinate with Transporters, Dispatcher to have faulty equipment repaired/replaced/upgraded.
- Assist with accidents, fraud, and complaints investigation, by collecting all relevant supporting data and footages.
- Conduct random checks on driver teams by calls and/or toolbox meetings.
- Verify driver working/rest time before each trip.
- Promote safety culture and safe practices to Transporters and drivers.

2. Performance Control
- Submit daily reports on Fleet Movement using data retrieved from system.
- Host monthly toolbox meeting / Drivers/Transporters to discuss monthly driver performance and issues and submit the minute of meeting to all relevant stakeholders.
- Assist with driver appraisal preparation, by verifying Transporters’ submitted nominations.
- Summarize monthly driver/transporters violations to supervisor, for review and penalties.
Job Requirement:
- Educational background: IT or Business Administration preferably from Logistics related field
- Experience: Basic understanding of logistic & supply chain in logistic operation, working with OBC (On-Board Computer) system, CCTV, or fleet telematics
- Skills: MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word), E-mail (Outlook), Group Chat Application (Telegram/WhatsApp), Google Map.
- Language: Good proficiency in English both Speaking and Writing

job title: Regional Sales Manager, Sales Supervisor & Sales Officer

Job Description: * Regional Sales Manager:• Sells products by maintaining and expanding customer base and managing staff.• Accomplishes regional sales staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees in assigned districts.• Communicates job expectations by planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions, and employee enforcing policies and procedures.• Plans and reviews compensation strategies.• Achieves regional sales operational objectives by contributing regional sales information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews.• Prepares and completes action plans and implements production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards.• Resolves problems, completes audits, identifies trends, determines regional sales system improvements, and implements change when necessary.• Meets regional sales objectives by forecasting requirements, preparing an annual budget, scheduling expenditures, analyzing variances, and initiating corrective actions.• Establishes sales objectives by creating a sales plan and quota for districts in support of national objectives.• Maintains and expands customer base by counseling district sales representatives, building and maintaining rapport with key customers, and identifying new customer opportunities.• President.* Sales Supervisor:• Understand customer needs and offer solutions and support.• Organize and coordinate sales representatives’ schedules.• Research potential leads from business directories, web searches, or digital resources.• Receive and report on all sales leads.• Supervise sales representatives and assistants.• Accomplishes staff job results by coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees.• Propose new idea, plan, and request to ensure the target achievement. • Answer potential customer questions and follow-up call questions.• Work with sales team when closing sales.• Implements and enforces systems, policies, and procedures.• Track weekly, monthly, and quarterly of sale performance. • Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.• Other tasks assign by Manager.* Sales Officer:• Conduct and perform daily sales activities in assigned area.• Handle product display and presentation, ensure there is enough product to supply to customer needed.• Follow up and update on the quality of all branding tool, ensure all POSM is located in good location and in good quality. • Execute Sales plan and activities to achieve Sales target. • Expand new distributor and maintain good relationship with existing distributors.• Daily visit outlet to meet with customer and get purchase order from customer. • Update report of competitor’s promotion and activities. • Daily report on Sales activities and achievement.• Other tasks assign by manager.

Job Description:
- Develop and implement standard HSEQ system including creating/updating procedure, implementing standard and maintaining a strong HSEQ culture throughout the company and its subsidiary.
- Collect and record all HSE events including accident, HIPO, near-miss and anomaly. Follow up the actions of those record from reporting to action plan and from action plan to close out. Register all those data in system tool and analysis for improvement action.
- Support innovation idea to improve HSEQ performance of affiliate including implement safety award programs
- Join investigation with sites on all accident or HIPO to find the root cause as well as setting up action for improvement.
- Organize/plan safety inspection tour to site such as Management safety tour, Joint safety tour, contractor owner and spot check. Follow up those inspection tour report until all actions are closed.
- Coordination with site representative on setting up all prevention plans for any projects and routine work including risk assessment, method of operations, emergency plan and standard practice for all high-risk activities
- Coordination with concerned department and contractor on scheduling HSEQ audits, HSEQ event (World day for Safety, Contractor Day, etc.) and other HSEQ meeting (rule roll out, REX sharing, etc.)
- Support and provide technical reference on road transport (lubricant & fuel) and marine transport (Barge & floating unit) including Emergency case such as fire, spill and injury.
- Support security process throughout the company covers all internal staff, visitors, contractor and other applicable stakeholder
- Support all activities related to sustainability and coordinate with purchase team to purchase items related to HSEQ such as PPE, etc. as well as control those items inventory.
- Assist HSEQ manager for all the administrative works, OPEX planning, maintaining all the HSEQ files, and other tasks which assigned by HSEQ manager

** Accountabilities:
- Responsible for all aspects of the HSEQ Department and by extension for the overall HSE strategy of the Company & Responsible for the implementation/maintenance of the necessary HSE related procedures, and also Emergency response
- Overall monitoring and follow-up of HSEQ activities/program
- Breakdown times are minimized and accidental damage to equipment are identified and analyzed
- Enforce company ethics, rules and regulations over staff & contractors Compliance to HSE and Technical Standards
Job Requirement:
- Educational background: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering
- Experience: At least 3 years of working experience on HSEQ related field
- Skill: Good Project Management Skills, Knowledge on Contractor Safety Management & Good Interpersonal & Supervisory Skills.
- Knowledge: MS Office, Internet and Email proficiency, Auto CAD, MS Project is preferable
- Language: Good proficiency of English for both writing and speaking.
- Valid driving license

- Perform preparation and review of internal and regulatory reports.
- Ensure continual enhancements to models to automate and optimise efficiency / accuracy to minimise manual processes / errors and model run time.
- Perform preparation and review of experience analyses / studies as well as assumptions reviews and updates. 
- Ensure all analyses / studies / methodology and assumptions reviews and updates are complete, accurate, consistent and use appropriate and/or commonly accepted methodologies.
- Ensure continual enhancements to experience studies for more granular / detailed analyses where there is statistically credible data available, as well as to improve consistency of approaches / methodologies used for different risk factors.
- Involvement in IFRS17 implementation
- Support in other departmental functions, as needed.
Preferred Skills and Experience:
- Good knowledge and use of Excel. (VBA knowledge is an advantage)
- Experience in using Prophet or other actuarial software. (coding experience in Prophet is an advantage)
- Good knowledge and experience in related aspects of actuarial work in a life insurance company, such as financial reporting bases, profit signatures, valuation
data and processes, actuarial and life policy admin systems, experience studies and strategic planning.
- Able to communicate and work well across functions in the company.
- Able to work independently, keen to learn and willing to develop junior actuaries.
- Good progress in actuarial exams.
Job Requirement:
3. WORKING RELATIONSHIPS
* Internal interface
- Report directly to the Actuarial Manager/ Appointed Actuary or such other person as the Company may direct from time to time.
- Work closely with other team members, other departments and Regional Head Office.
- Coordinate and communicate with other departments and regulators.
Company Profile:
We are one of the leading Japanese Life Insurance company with more than 100 years of history in the life insurance industry, with an extensive international business network in various countries around the world.  We are recruiting to add onto our team of pioneers in the operations department to support our business growth in Cambodia.

company_name: The Centre for Peace and Conflict Studies (CPCS)
Job Requirement:
•	Education: Masters degree in Human Resource Management or Business Administration or related field preferred; strong candidates with Bachelor’s degree with minimum five years experience will be considered.
•	Work Experience: For applicants with Masters degree, at least three years practical experience in human resource management and in executing tasks similar to those described above. Experience of working with a Non-Governmental Organisation (NGO) in Asia or other international setting is an advantage; experience in peace building / conflict manage setting is desirable.
•	Values Oriented – It is essential that the candidate have a strong sense of personal values and principles, which align with CPCS values and ethos.
•	Required Disposition – Proactive, action oriented, with ability to follow up and respond quickly to new opportunities. Ability to manage ambiguity and changing priorities; maturity in managing self to balance energy. Actively seeks and shares feedback. A high level of emotional intelligence, interpersonal skills, and the ability to adapt cross-cultural settings, including working within multiple cultural contexts simultaneously.
•	Organisational Skills: Must be highly motivated, hard-working, well organised and detail-oriented. Demonstrated commitment to excellence. Ability to meet short- and long-term deadlines with minimal supervision.
•	Relationship building skills: Ability to develop and manage strong relationships with diverse partners and multiple stakeholders; ability to networks
•	Communication Skills: Must have rticulate and tactful oral and written communication skills with a strong command of both Khmer and English languages.
•	Confidentiality: Protects the organisation and its operations by ensuring the confidentiality of sensitive information


To apply, submit letter of interest and CV/Resume, including	three references, to centrepeaceconflictstudies@gmail.com
Company Profile:
The Centre for Peace and Conflict Studies (CPCS) is home to interconnected programs that invest in Leadership and facilitation for lasting peace in Asia. CPCS interventions focus on leadership, learning, analysis, and facilitation, using our experience as well as connections across the region as resources to support new thinking, new relationships, and new interventions. Specifically, we aim to: Engage in systematic Analysis and facilitation for practical conflict resolution, by accompanying regional and national conflicts in Asia; invest in peace leadership for conflict transformation, through academic, diplomacy, and peace leadership courses; and connect practical learning for pragmatic change, connecting academics and practitioners from across the regional to share learning and best practices.

CPCS is based in Cambodia and works across Asia, with dedicated programs on Korea, Myanmar, the Philippines as well as regional conflicts. Interventions are grounded in ongoing analysis involving diverse stakeholders, sharing and triangulating information, and connecting different information and perspectives. This informs a complex and nuanced analysis to help stakeholders connect the dots, deepen their understanding, and inform strategic interventions. CPCS facilitates meetings between and amongst key stakeholders, to align efforts to reduce violence. CPCS work is demand driven and responds to needs and requests from partners, drawing on CPCS’ technical expertise in peacebuilding, mediation, and conflict transformation. Interventions must be flexible and adaptable to respond to shifting dynamics.
Contact Info: Contact Information  Rachel Cabulong  095 904 934 abc.cpcs@gmail.com Ly Residence, Unit #501, 5th floor, Svaydangkum commune, Siem Reap City, Siem Reap 095 904 934

Job Description:
The Senior Sales Associate is responsible for providing warm welcome, effective presentation and demonstration of products and with a high level of service to customers in order to satisfy their shopping needs and enhance their shopping experience.

RESPONSIBILITIES
• Achieve sales target as assigned by the Company
• Follow the company guideline and operational standard
• Replenish products on shelf and participate in stock count
• Maintain good housekeeping conditions in the store
• Maintain well-presented visual merchandise and displays
• Provide excellent customer service and product knowledge to customers
• Assist in opening and closing of the store
• Assist in cashiering duties when required
• Assist and support in-store marketing events
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENT
• Min. high school degree or higher in any field
• At least 1 year experience in fashion retail or service industry
• Pleasant, neat, warm and friendly personality
• Service-oriented with strong selling and customer service skills
• Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
• Confident, honest, enthusiastic and a good team player
• Responsible, patient and motivated with positive work attitude
• Computer literate is an added advantage
• Good in spoken English to liaise with the superiors and serve international customers
• Commit to work on shift, long hours, weekends, and Public Holidays as needed
• Able to work at CHIP MONG 271 MEGA MALL
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall (Phnom Penh) N/A

job title: Store Supervisor (CCOO, LYN, JELLY BUNNY, FRED PERRY)
position: Store Supervisor (CCOO, LYN, JELLY BUNNY, FRED PERRY)
Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall N/A

•	Fast and proactive learner
•	Ability to work under pressure
•	Strong command of spoken and written English
•	Possess initiative and have an analytical mindset
•	Flexible to travel in and out of the country
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
About The Job:

Credit Assurance and Control is a part of credit control in the lending business of the bank that is primarily responsible for inspection and controlling to strengthen the quality of loans, comply with the lending requirement and mitigate internal fraud.

What You Will Do:

•	Work closely with RM, Credit Admin, Credit Ops, BM, and other relevant staff for credit file checking, obtaining responses on finding from relevant parties, fulfillment of the shortage requirement document
•	Make regular visits to branches, business banking, and other lending supporting centers for checking credit files and relevant documents
•	Verify all loan conditions, papers, and processes to check whether it’s in compliance or not with the bank’s policy, guidelines, procedure, and other requirements
•	Conduct customer, business, or collateral site visits and inspections where necessary to verify and attend meetings with customers to discuss reviews and the verification process 
•	Case by case, advise RM and/or owner of an issue finding to fulfill the shortage required document during the inspection and checking
•	Make regular reports to management with prompt recommendations and the next action required to the owner of an issue finding to be completed 
•	Make an annual plan for case inspection and credit file checking, and implement timely and effectively  
•	Provide support, education, and training to branches and relevant staff to build a credit assurance and control culture within the bank
•	Assist the credit risk department to perform loan quality and portfolio control
•	All other duties and matters ancillary to the above that Management may require from time to time
•	Require good analyst and judgment skills and the ability to identify the issue of the case
•	Ensure review queries are dealt with in a timely & accurate manner, and have the ability to chase and follow up regularly with branches and other issue finding for responses and fulfillments
•	Require ability and the confidence to work with BM, Department Head, and Senior Management both in Khmer and English
•	Manage time efficiently and prioritize workloads to meet strict deadlines while handling multiple tasks
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have:

•	At least a bachelor’s degree in business administration, finance, banking, auditing, or in a related field
•	At least 4-5 years of experience in marketing, market research, or any related area.

Job Description:
The Supply Chain Manager leads all Supply Chain activities including Demand & Supply Planning, Logistics, Customer Facing Supply Chain, and Procurement. As a visible and commercially oriented business leader, the incumbent provides direction for all Supply Chain activities in the company and collaborates with vendors to set the strategic direction. Responsible for Supply Chain performance as part of the leadership team (reports to General Manager).

** Key Responsibilities:
Leadership of Supply Chain in Support of Business Results
1- Leads the teams involved in Demand & Supply Planning, Logistics, Customer Facing Supply Chain, and Procurement.
2- Organizes the work of the Supply Chain teams to ensure delivery of business results in support of sales, profit and cash flow, by ensuring accuracy of planning, agility of response, excellence in execution and efficiency of spend, while always ensuring safety and compliance.
3- Leads key business processes including SAP, Slow Moving & Obsolete inventory and contributes strongly to New Products launches and Portfolio Management
4- Leads the transformation of Supply Chain into a competitive advantage
5- Develop strategies, policies, procedures and performance management to bring supply chain performance to the next level.

** Supply Chain Performance Management
6- Ensures performance of the Supply Chain teams to deliver the KPIs and business results
7- Monitors performance through data driven analysis and leading indicators. Guides teams on improvement opportunities and intervenes to provide support where needed
8- Encourages an atmosphere of continuous improvement and leverage benchmarking to identify key areas for improvement, while ensuring these are linked to business priorities & will deliver business results
9- Ensures key tools (e.g. FIFO/FEFO, 5s standard) are fully understood and leveraged in appropriate areas
10- Establish key metrics and benchmarks to identify and then execute opportunities to improve performance
11- Delivers superior Forecast Accuracy and performance to our customers through reliable planning and execution
12- Manage supply and cost risks and work to ensure we can support our customers even in the most difficult of circumstances 

** Team Capability Building
13- Identify the skills needed for Supply Chain roles & ensure for development and succession plans
14- Creates a spirit of One Supply Chain to bring all teams together under common objectives, while also ensuring strong integration with other teams to enable processes and deliver results by acting as the business co-pilot
15- Coaches Supply Chain talent (day to day and in assigned mentoring situations)
16- Responsible for sustaining a Supply Chain which is fit for purpose, capable of handling the evolving needs of the business and is cost optimized

** Reporting Structure and Key Stakeholders
- Reports directly to General Manager
- Supervises the leaders of Demand & Supply Planning, Logistics, Customer Facing Supply Chain, and Procurement.
- Works closely with the Project Sales Manager, Channel Sales Manager, Finance Manager, Marketing Manager and the whole leadership team.
Job Requirement:
-Experienced (average of 5 years) in Supply Chain or similar roles in construction and consumer goods industry
-Business insight: strong understanding of the wider business, industry and market dynamics. Be able to apply this knowledge into strategy/tactics development and spot potential opportunities/risks
-Functional knowledge: is an expert in Supply Chain. Can coach and develop the Supply Chain team and explain Supply Chain to others. Equally comfortable in technical detail and with strategy
-Hands on: can get into details and do things themselves, not just issue instructions from a desk
-Strategic mindset: can build a robust plan supported by a clear, logical strategic framework; able to
anticipate and visualize future scenarios
-Financial acumen: very comfortable with complex numbers and understands financial analysis
-Strong sense of accountability: thinks and acts like an owner
-Drive for results: passionate to deliver results and is not easily daunted by challenges, strong execution capability
-Balances stakeholders: be able to consider different views of stakeholders and makes a balanced, well-thought-out decisions
-Effectively communicates: able to package and deliver messages in a clear and convincing manner and able to influence the right action from an audience
-Agility: be comfortable to shift style or ways of working depending on the business situation; can thrive in an organization where structure/process is still being developed
-Driven by the need to achieve meaningful results and be part of a purpose-driven organization

Job Description: JOB SUMMARY• Reporting to the HNWI Assistant Sales Manager, the incumbent will be responsible for building business relationship and partnership with corporate customers such as banks, petroleum, telecommunication, embassies, and key corporate customers to develop brand preference for PR Cam portfolios.• He/she will also be responsible for collaborating with marketing & brand teams, Public Affair, TOFT sales team, and related parties to leverage corporate networking events into sales and relationship building opportunities.KEY MISSIONS INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO:• Build strong relationships with corporate customers and develop brand preference for Ballantine’s & Chivas, Royal Salute, and wine:• Mandatory monthly engagement with as many as key stakeholders of corporate customers• Provide after sales service to corporate customers• Acquire new corporate customers and nurture the relationship with assigned existing corporate customers• Host local brand events targeting corporate customers acquisition and retention including running tasting programs, private dinners, presentation of high-end collection items• Collaborate with marketing & brand teams, and related parties to develop tailor made consumer promotion programs to push corporate sales• Develop strong partnerships with relevant external stakeholders that will enable acquisition and retention of corporate customers• Engage identified relevant luxury companies to build cross collaboration events and database acquisition / swapping• Identify and engage with relevant gate-keepers enabling access to corporate customers (sommeliers, business associations, etc)• Identify and engage with relevant F&B venues (restaurants for example) to develop partnerships enabling corporate customers acquisition, engagement and retention• Identify and engage with relevant tribes to convert them into advocates of High Age Ballantine’s & Chivas, Royal Salute, Martell Prestige products.• Enrich the knowledge and provide insights into corporate customers• Collect Personally Identifiable Information on customers customers in respect of PDPA regulation enabling to store database and improve the management of the corporate customers• Identify, report and propose counter-measures to competitors’ activities
Job Requirement: JOB REQUIREMENTS• Degree holder with formal business qualifications or equivalent• Computer literate Proficient in Excel and PowerPoint• Excellent presentation, communication and negotiation skills are absolute must• Experience in luxury or hospitality industry is a must• Understands the culture & behavior of luxury industry• Sommelier experience and knowledge of the wine & spirits products (WSET diploma) are strong plus• Excellent command of English and Mandarin spoken and written• Conversational grasp of local Singaporean dialects (eg. Teochew, hokkien, Cantonese) is a plusPERSONAL & BEHAVIOURAL SKILLS• Excellent critical thinking and analytical skills• Organised, self-motivated, confident, convivial and strong result orientation• Entrepreneurial mindset and proactive• Energetic, confident, with strong social networking ability, influence skills and outgoing personality who enjoys the night life• A team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills• Curious nature, with wide general knowledge
Company Profile:
Pernod Ricard is the second-largest premium wines & spirits group, operating in over 86 affiliates and producing the widest international product portfolio in the industry with top brands such Absolut Vodka, Martell Cognac, Mumm Champagne, The Glenlivet, and Chivas Regal whisky among others. Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. imports and distributes products from the Group portfolio into the Cambodian market.
 
BACKGROUND
Pernod Ricard SA was created in 1975 through the link-up of the two largest French anise-based spirits companies: Pernod, which was founded in 1805, and Ricard, founded by Paul Ricard in 1932. Strategic M&A over the past three decades have vaulted Pernod Ricard into one of the top-tier international Wines & Spirits organizations in the world. In July 2017, Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. was launched locally, and marked the start of Pernod Ricard’s operations in Cambodia.

Job Description:
About The Job:

Credit Assurance and Control is a part of credit control in the lending business of the bank that is primarily responsible for inspection and controlling to strengthen the quality of loans, compliance with lending requirements, and mitigating internal fraud.

What You Will Do:

•	Work closely with RM, Credit Admin, Credit Ops, BM, and other relevant staff for credit file checking, obtaining responses on finding from relevant parties, fulfillment of the shortage requirement document
•	Make regular visits to branches, business banking, and other lending supporting centers for checking credit files and relevant documents
•	Verify all loan conditions, papers, and processes to check whether it’s in compliance or not with the bank’s policy, guidelines, procedure, and other requirements
•	Conduct customer, business, or collateral site visits and inspections where necessary to verify and attend meetings with customers to discuss reviews and the verification process 
•	Case by case, advise RM and/or owner of an issue finding to fulfill the shortage required document during the inspection and checking
•	Make regular reports to management with prompt recommendations and the next action required for the owner of an issue finding to be completed 
•	Make an annual plan for case inspection and credit file checking, and implement timely and effectively  
•	Provide support, education, and training to branches and relevant staff to build a credit assurance and control culture within the bank
•	Assist the credit risk department to perform loan quality and portfolio control
•	All other duties and matters ancillary to the above that Management may require from time to time
•	Require good analyst and judgment skills and the ability to identify the issue of the case
•	Ensure review queries are dealt with in a timely & accurate manner, and have the ability to chase and follow up regularly with branches and other issue finding for responses and fulfillments
•	Require ability and the confidence to work with BM, Department Head, and Senior Management both in Khmer and English
•	Manage time efficiently and prioritize workloads to meet strict deadlines while handling multiple tasks
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have:

•	At least a bachelor’s degree in business administration, finance, banking, auditing, or in a related field
•	At least 2-3 years of experience in marketing, market research, or any related area.
•	At least 2-3 years total experience lately in loan assessment, loan analysis, loan review, loan control, loan auditor, or in a related field
•	Most experience in loan quality assurance or control positions within commercial banks or other FIs would be a definite asset 
•	Knowledge of lending facilities’ features and process
•	Good investigation, analytical, and problem-solving skills
•	Strong working knowledge of verifying and calculating income & assets, and evaluating credit reports, purchase agreements, appraisals, and other loan documentation
•	Good communication skills
•	Strong proficiency with MS Office software
•	Good command of English and Khmer

Job Description:
The Inventory Controller will assign to handle on the company products inventory in all company’s premises. S/he objectives have to maintains records of materials in inventory and on order. Monitors reorder points and initiates action to replenish stock. Reconciles discrepancies in inventories and notifies superior of irregularities.

** Key Responsibilities:
1. Monitoring and maintaining current inventory levels;
2. Ensure accuracy between system and physical inventory
3. Manage and plan conduct physical inventory count for monthly, quarterly and yearly
4. Records purchases, maintains database, performs physical count of inventory, and reconciles actual stock
count to computer-generated reports and adjustment
5. Conduct root cause analysis and corrective action on inventory discrepancies or variances
6. Processes and documents return as required following established procedures
7. Process and monitor stock movement in system GR, GI, GT or block/ write-off stock
8. Ensure the alignment of all documents are properly complied with the policies as long as governance the documents.
9. Compile and report of inventory such as expiration, damage stock, obsolete stock, stock aging, movement report
10. Reinforce the WH standard operating procedure (SOP) and suggest improvement points
11. Collaborate and coordinate with warehouse, logistic team and other stakeholder to ensure business goals are met
12. Performs routine clerical duties in support of unit, including data entry.
13. Other tasks as assigned by superior
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor’s degree or associate’s degree in Accounting or equivalent work
● 2 years of experience in logistics and inventory management
● Experience and knowledge of supplies, equipment, and/or services ordering and inventory control
● Ability to reconcile stock counts to report data
● Database management skills
● Ability to analyze and solve problems
● Ability to prepare routine administrative paperwork
● Ability to receive, stock, and/or deliver goods
● Strong interpersonal skills are essential with a high degree of sensitivity for confidentiality
● Ambitious, flexible, active, creative idea and eager to learn new things
● Proactively, passionately, honestly and punctually
● Computer literacy, advance of Excel and software system is a plus

Job Description:
About The Job:

As a Manager for Digital Channel Development, the candidate will lead the Digital Products Development department. Be responsible for detailed business analysis and functional solution design in a transactional digital platform (Internet, Mobile Banking, ATM, and QA) targeted branch, SME, and Commercial customer segments. Bring in the strong domain and functional solution design and delivery expertise to deliver customer-oriented process design, user experience, and detailed functional design of digital assets.

What You Will Do:
•	Design strategy and roadmap for digital Banking 
•	Lead and drive Digital Product Development to meet digital product roadmap 
•	Prepare Product Documents and Manage Approval
•	Innovation & initiatives through the development lifecycle
•	Work direct with internal and external partners, including NBC
•	Oversee development stages

Job Description: Job Summary:This position is responsible for preparing monthly tax return and annual tax return (corporate income tax/CIT) to ensure accuracy, compliance with applicable regulations of Cambodia Taxation Law, and timeliness of submission to General Tax Department or its branches. The incumbent is also responsible for corresponding on/dealing with tax audit and financial audit matters.Key Responsibilities and Job-Related CharacteristicsTaxes:– Work closely with tax consultant (PwC) in preparing and reviewing monthly tax return to ensure timely submission– Prepare CIT estimate for half year and CIT working for full year with full liaison/corresponding with tax consultant– Update to management on new tax regulations which could impact the company’s operation of business– Tax audit▪ Work closely with tax consultant to get regular update on tax audit status▪ Fully understand elements of tax reassessment and assess the company’s grounds and possibility of objection▪ Work collaboratively with internal team in order to prepare documents required by tax auditors over the course of tax audits▪ Review objection letter before final approval from MD▪ Prepare ‘tax audit progress’ update to management▪ Other tasks necessary to fulfill tax audit requirementFinancial audit– Fully follow up on audit pending points and effectively investigate required documents/info to close the gap– Carefully prepare and review documents as requested by external auditors– Effectively deal with external auditors with initiatives of alternative procedures where necessary– Prepare ‘financial audit progress’ update to management– Other tasks necessary to conclude financial audits
Job Requirement: JOB REQUIREMENTS– Bachelor’s degree of finance and accounting. Master’s degrees and/or CPA/ACCA is a plus.– Degree holder with formal business qualifications or equivalent. Diploma of Cambodia Taxation is a plus.– Minimum 5 years working experience in tax field/tax audit and statutory audit– Previous experience in Multinational FMCG, or manufacturing company.– Good command of spoken and written EnglishPersonal and behavioral skills:– Good level of critical thinking and analytical skills– Organized and strong result orientation– Entrepreneurial mindset and proactive– Energetic and outgoing personality who enjoys the night life– A team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills– Strong knowledge of Cambodia International Financial Reporting Standards (CIFRS) and local tax regulations.
Company Profile:
Pernod Ricard is the second-largest premium wines & spirits group, operating in over 86 affiliates and producing the widest international product portfolio in the industry with top brands such Absolut Vodka, Martell Cognac, Mumm Champagne, The Glenlivet, and Chivas Regal whisky among others. Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. imports and distributes products from the Group portfolio into the Cambodian market.
 
BACKGROUND
Pernod Ricard SA was created in 1975 through the link-up of the two largest French anise-based spirits companies: Pernod, which was founded in 1805, and Ricard, founded by Paul Ricard in 1932. Strategic M&A over the past three decades have vaulted Pernod Ricard into one of the top-tier international Wines & Spirits organizations in the world. In July 2017, Pernod Ricard (Cambodge) Co. Ltd. was launched locally, and marked the start of Pernod Ricard’s operations in Cambodia.

Job Description:
About The Job:
As a Digital QA Tester, you will test the functionality of the product to find the bugs in the system and issues related to the user interface or experience. You will work closely with the IT-PMO developer, and designer and understand features and implement robust and comprehensive test plans to verify the functionality of Mobile apps. Success in this role will be demonstrated by providing quality work output, screening for errors, and refining usability throughout the software development and implementation process.
Key focus:
•	Lead and Performing Digital User Testing (UAT)
•	Update Management on the test result and the issue highlighted

What You Will Do:
•	Join the project planning, estimate testing
•	Develop, review, and update test plans, Test cases, and facilitate test tools.
•	Controls and manage daily test activities.
•	Document and evaluate test results
•	Detects, logs, and reports bugs and glitches.
•	Perform testing on the products, functional testing, regression testing, exploratory testing, etc.
•	Take ownership of product quality and readiness for every product release.
•	Clear and effective communication of issues to the developer
•	Ensure the testing meet business’s expectation and demand
•	Test driving user, feature grooming, designing, and developing through test case
•	Manage testing done during timeline set
•	Work with the UAT team on the issue highlighted
•	Update the test result to management
•	Manage UAT sign-off with relevant stakeholders
•	Handle tasks assigned by the Line Manager.
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software engineering, or related fields
•	2 years experience with QA tester role for Mobile App or web project
•	Understanding of testing process and methodologies.
•	Experience or knowledge in creating test deliverables such as test cases and test status reports
•	High attention to detail and solid analytical and problem-solving skills
•	Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
•	Experience in agile frameworks and regression testing desired
•	Good time management and self-discipline.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114
