Job Description:
Functional Responsibilities

- Champions multiple brands in market.
- Drives strategic brand execution excellence.
- Plan and Develop the Annual Marketing activities calendar
- Support TTL (Through the line) programs collaborating Digital Marketing Manager.
- Critically evaluates brand activities to ensure return on investment.
- Accountable to deliver Sales, Market Share & Brand Equity objectives for all EFG brands excepted TPC.
- Lead the coordination with Head of brand to ensure synchronized execution of Brand & Store plans
- Lead the NPI/LTO agenda in coordination with franchiser and cross functional alignment – Head of Brand, Operation, Procurement etc.
- Lead the local insights projects – when applicable
- Coach and develop the reporting Marketing Executive

Financial Responsibilities

- Marketing Budget management include Budget Planning & implementation tracking.. etc

Travel Requirement

-Travel to countries when possible and support branches performance.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in marketing, management, or related fields
- 3+ years prior experience working in a marketing role or multi brands management.
- Proven ability to develop brands and marketing
- Must be able to think analytically and strategically
- Capable of working well as part of a team as well as independently
- Great multitasker and capable of simultaneously managing multiple projects with different deadlines

Due to a large number of applicants, we will only be able to follow up with candidates who are shortlisted for an interview, and this will happen within 10 working days from the date of your application.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #320, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Tek Laak 1, Khan Toul Kok 017 888 349

Job Description:
Customer Service
- Support cargo reservations and bookings whilst providing exemplary customer service
- Provide timely vendor notification for on time and delayed flights
- Provide timely shipment status updates to customers
- Help to manage Ground Handling Agent performance and provide guidelines and instructions
- Support the established performance targets through operational oversight and participation

Administrative Support

- Prepare flight documentation for crew and Customs
- Check and review post flight documentation
- Prepare post flight reports in a timely and accurate manner
- Provide freighter catering uplift and last minute changes
- Coordinate effectively between engineering, airport operations, air traffic control and vendors to ensure smooth communication and service provision
- Coordinate cargo service activities between sales, operations and ground handling in order to ensure efficient handling of shipments
- Communicate effectively via various channels stakeholders including customers, airport and cargo operations, suppliers, flight crew etc.
- Assist with various administrative station tasks such as SAP
- Coordinate weather diversions at diversion sites
- Handle diversion of Cathay Pacific Flights when required
- Assist with crew administration and support matters at the port
- Support station training activities as required
- Support station management in supplier oversight including reporting Ground Handling Agent performance issues
- Any other reasonable task as requested

Ramp Coordinator 

- Monitor and ensure the required procedures are properly carried out by Ramp Handling Operator and the Cargo Terminal Operator particularly for special cargo, movement of in/out cargo and mail units on an ad-hoc basis, loading and unloading of freighter, etc.
- Monitor the optimisation of space utilisation for loaded Unit Load Devices and the belly of freighters
- Ensure aircraft searches required by the Security Programme are conducted prior to loading
- Maintain good communications with captain-in-command, Ramp - Handling Operator, Cargo Terminal Operator and the Cargo Office
- Liaise closely with the Cargo Office to provide up to date information of freighter positioning when there is disruption of schedule
- Quickly resolve issues on the ramp as required
- Ensure safe operations are maintained at times particularly during loading and unloading of freighters
- Assess the cause of any delay and provide recommendations to the immediate supervisor on accountability for the cause and solution
- Monitor the acceptance and release of such special cargo as animals, engine, vehicle, bulky shipment, and odd-sized items
- Coordinate the activities in the warehouse and conduct quality checks on cargo handling from the Cargo Terminal Operator and the Ramp Handling Operator
- Any other reasonable task as requested

Safety, Security and Compliance

- Help to ensure compliance and conformance to all regulatory and internal safety, security, quality, and procedural requirements
- Undertake quality check programmes established by Head Office and participate in audits as required
- Support the Emergency and Accident role as required
- May be designated Operational Duty Holder for the station as required
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree graduation: Knowledge, Skills, Training and Experience
- Minimum 2 years’ experience in the cargo industry is an advantage
- Strong communication skills
- Natural customer service orientation
- Attentive to detail
- Knowledge of MS Word, Excel and PowerPoint

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description: • Review contractors’ proposed construction programmed and verify the timely completion of key elements and phases• Monitor and provide regular reports to the contractors’ installation and quality control procedures and undertake quality assurance audits• Facilitate discussion between planning and design department to resolve design and construction inrelation to technical issues• Prepare progress reports during the progress of the works on a monthly basis, or at other intervalsconsidered necessary by the project manager• Make regular site inspections to ensure that the works are being properly coordinated, supervised and executed in accordance with the contract documents and to good and safe engineering practices• Revie progress of the contract works and at regular intervals of the project, carry out inspection andprovide a full list and report of snags and defects• On completion of the contract works, provide a written report and summary of lessons learnt• Responsible for coordination of MEP works to avoid discrepancies and non-compliance on-site• Coordinate and attend joint inspections of defect rectification with the contractor and the contractors• Monitor and approve that all defects, snags and outstanding works are rectified• Verify all MEP equipment settings provided by the contractor• Other tasks will assign by direct manager.

We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Description:
The Senior Sales Associate is responsible for providing warm welcome, effective presentation and demonstration of products and with a high level of service to customers in order to satisfy their shopping needs and enhance their shopping experience.

RESPONSIBILITIES
• Achieve sales target as assigned by the Company
• Follow the company guideline and operational standard
• Replenish products on shelf and participate in stock count
• Maintain good housekeeping conditions in the store
• Maintain well-presented visual merchandise and displays
• Provide excellent customer service and product knowledge to customers
• Assist in opening and closing of the store
• Assist in cashiering duties when required
• Assist and support in-store marketing events
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENT
• Min. high school degree or higher in any field
• At least 1 year experience in fashion retail or service industry
• Pleasant, neat, warm and friendly personality
• Service-oriented with strong selling and customer service skills
• Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
• Confident, honest, enthusiastic and a good team player
• Responsible, patient and motivated with positive work attitude
• Computer literate is an added advantage
• Good in spoken English to liaise with the superiors and serve international customers
• Commit to work on shift, long hours, weekends, and Public Holidays as needed
• Able to work at CHIP MONG 271 MEGA MALL
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall (Phnom Penh) N/A

Job Description: - Planning and overseeing the work of vendors- Negotiate with vendors for parts, negotiating the best price guarantee- Develop new supply sources (vendors) where vendors are inadequate- Make sure procurement complies with corporate guidelines- Maintain vendor relationships, promote collaboration, liaise between internal teams and vendors
Job Requirement: - Knowledge of Cambodia and the South-East Asia market- Minimum of 3 -5 years of purchasing experience in the automotive industry- Outstanding communication skills- Business level English skills
Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh HQ: , #93B, St590, Vllage13, Sangkat Boeng kok, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

Job Description: - Analyzing supply chain data to ensure the uninterrupted availability of stock.- Forecasting supply and demand to prevent overstocking and running out-of-stock (OOS).- Evaluating vendors and suppliers’ offers and negotiating profitable purchase prices.- Placing and receiving orders to replenish stocks as needed.- Tracking shipments and coordinating internal stock transfers, as well as resolving delays.- Overseeing stock storage processes, including tagging, boxing, and labeling.- Maintaining a steady flow of stock from storage to where it is needed.- Performing regular inventory audits and keeping stock purchasing within budget.-  Maintaining and updating daily shipment records, as well as purchases and pricing reports.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor's degree/Studying in logistics, business administration, or a related field preferred.- A minimum of 1 year' experience as a stock controller in a similar industry.- Great analytical and problem-solving skills.- Superb negotiation, collaboration, and communication abilities.- Exceptional organizational and time management skills.- Location : Near Indra Tevi High School, Boeng Kork 2, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh.- Salary Rank : $200-$250- Working Days : Mon-Sat- Working Hour : 8am-5pm

Job Description: #Knowledge Function- Be able to understand the EV Business, Charging-Swapping models at an accelerated pace- Be able to understand the ONiON Mobility’s technology processes at an accelerated pace- Be able to have or develop an independent point of view for the EV Business on the whole and specifically in relation to ONiON Mobility#Planning Function- Planning battery & charger requirements based on operational and sales metrics- Planning station network in Phnom Penh and in other provinces aligned to company goals- Planning manpower requirements at stations- Planning station models and way and means to achieve individual station profitability- Planning operational budgets#Operation Function- Running day-to-day operations with operation team at all stations- Delivering station revenue and profitability in line with company’s profitability goals- Streamlining and optimising station utility rates, battery & charger utilisation rates, optimising delivery routes to hub stations- Creating, executing and maintaining SOPs’ for  operational standards, station hygiene and safety standards- Creating, executing and maintaining operational reports as required by the company#Partner Management- **Existing Partners :** Working with and managing existing relationships with partners - both at a high level and with working level teams- **New Partners :** Finding, developing and working with new partners who can help expand ONiON Mobility’s footprint in Cambodia and in the region- **Govt. &  VIP Visitors :** Handling Govt. & VIP visitors and be able to explain, evangelise and advocate for company’s Vision, Mission and Business#Vendor & Agency Management- **Existing Vendors :** Create and maintain good working relationship with existing vendors and partners- **New Vendors :** Finding, developing and creating a roster of approved vendors for operational and station requirements- **Govt. Departments :** Create and maintain good working relationship with Govt. Departments (like the EDC)- **House Owners & Landlords :** Be able to create and maintain good working relationship with existing and future house owners and landlords for rental locations#Contract Management- Be able to create, input into, negotiate contracts of various types and natures#Team Management- Train and mentor current team in operational best practices- Recruit operational team members across roles as required- Conduct performance evaluations of team members as required- Plan shift rosters and staff OT and rotation for weekly offs and public holidays- Support Sales Team in the sales process and in finding sales opportunities- Work with other company teams for CFT projects and on the daily
Job Requirement: - Minimum of 7-8 years of Operational Management experience- Minimum of 5-6 years of leading growing operational teams- Minimum of 5-6 years of handling daily movement of high value, high rotation items

Job Description:
** Objectives of the Position
To proactively develop and execute all sales & marketing activities in order to accelerate the sales of TOA’s solutions (products and services), as well as to maintain customer’s satisfaction at the top level. Develop new client network and new markets with existing products portfolio. Be
a TOA representative, to introduce new products and solutions to all customers, influencers and stakeholders in a professional manner.

** Main Tasks
• Proactive Sales & Marketing – Identify potential key clients & customers and develop strong
working relationship in order to obtain upstream information on current and upcoming projects as
well as close sales.
• Technical Development – Work closely with clients & customers and introduce TOA products
and services to the projects professionally.
• Corporate Image – To work closely with “Marketing Team” on the corporate image to be
presented to the market through brochures, advertisements, newsletters, events, etc.
• Corporate Profile – Increase the awareness of TOA products and services in the market
through provide presentation, demonstration, coordination at project site, conferences,
exhibitions, etc.
• Product Development – To work closely with the “Technical Teams” to support development
and innovation of new products and services to meet market demands.
• Analysis – Conducts analysis of market, customers, competition, latest trends and product
development opportunities.
• Liaison – Be the ambassador of the company in the construction industry. Represent the
company in various trade forums, customer groups, influencer groups and standards
development authorities.
• Customer Satisfaction – Be a focal point to provide all supports and services beyond
customer’s expectation in order to maximize customer satisfaction.
Job Requirement:
• Education: Bachelor degree, major in civil engineering, architecture, marketing or relevant fields.
• Working Experience: minimum 5 years in construction or relevant industries.
• Knowledge of computer program (MS Office, Outlook, Internet, Email).
• Willing to learn attitude and quick learner.
• Motivated to learn new skills and technologies.
• Being proactive, flexible, can travel and stay overnight in other provinces.
• Good interpersonal skill and teamwork mind set.
• Language: Proficient in Khmer & English. Chinese would be a plus. 

Application should include a resume, accompanied by a covering letter outlining the candidate’s interest in suitability for the position. Applications will be reviewed and processed on a rolling basis and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Company Profile: TOA is the leader of innovative and decorative paint manufacturer in South East Asia who offers and supplies a variety of demand by a plenty innovative painting solution system in both household and industrial market. More than 50 years of paint business, our products continue to gain an increasing share of the highly competitive in both international market and domestic sales due to our premium product quality and high service level.  With high standard and strong product portfolio, TOA has been growing faster than the industry average. We draw our strengths from the new products, best-managed behavior, and also strong sales force. During the past ten years, TOA has expanded its business to Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, Malaysia and Indonesia. TOA considers the importance of the human capital and equality of opportunity. Our employees will be offered an attractive salary and benefits package as well as career and learning development.

Job Description: - Develops maximum sales potential through competitive sales techniques and knowledge of the company's products and services as well as the competition's strengths/weaknesses- Builds and maintains quality relations with assigned accounts, increases account base and volume of sales on a consistent basis- Follows up with sales leads generated through incoming calls, advertising campaigns, and other promotional efforts to expand current customer base- Contacts current customers via telephone, correspondence or in person by traveling as frequently as necessary to meet and surpass profitable sales goals for the company- Investigate problems; prepare reports; develop solutions and make recommendations to management in order to resolve customer complaints.- Managing the entire rental sales process from prospect to close, including rental fleet utilization- Maintaining a consistent call schedule- Prepare rental sales projections, rental sales goals and success tracking- Follow up with customers to ensure timely payment- Work with Operation team to retrieve vehicle due late payment- Perform other duties as requested.

Job Description:
• To make OP for each staff to archive monthly sales target.
• បង្កើត OP សំរាប់ធ្វើរបាយការណ័ទិន្នន័យលក់របស់បុគ្គលិកម្នាក់ៗ

• To make composition of shelf display each product depends on seasonal event.
• រៀបចំផលិតផលតាមលំដាប់និងប្រភេទនីមួយៗទៅតាមរដូវកាល

• គ្រប់គ្រងការទិញ និងការបញ្ជារទិញផលិតផលកំឡុងពេលត្រួតពិនិត្យស្តុក

• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លម្អិតអំពីកិច្ចការ និង គោលដៅលក់ទៅកាន់ការិយាល័យកណ្តាលរៀងរាល់សប្តាហ៍

• To make shift for each staff while checking staff situation.
• ធ្វើការផ្លាស់ប្តូរនិងចល័តបុគ្គលិកទៅតាមស្ថានភាពនិងតម្រូវការក្រុមហ៊ុន

• All Operation Management
• មានភាពច្បាស់លាស់ក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងការគ្រប់គ្រង Operation

• Bachelor Degree in Business Management or Any Related Field.
• បានបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ័ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងធុរកិច្ច រឺក៏ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ពន្ធ័

• At Least 2 or 3 years experiences with General Manager in Clinic or Company Before.

Job Description:
What you will do: 

• Perform verification of invoices from suppliers and other related supporting documents
• Resolve any discrepancy founding during invoice matching process with other departments.
• Review and reconciliation between suppliers’ statement of accounts and internal records
• Ensure all invoices have been checked and follow Cambodia Tax Regulation
• Organize invoices and perform the reconciliation of vendor statement
• Assist in working with internal and external auditor as required
• Maintain all vendor related documents including invoices and supporting documents
• Produce monthly reports to management and Observe monthly stock take at store if required
• Perform other tasks as assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
What you need to have: 

• Bachelor’s Degree in finance, or fresh graduate of accounting related field is required
• One-year experiences the same position or related industries 

• Knowledge of Accounting/Finance and Accounts Receivable is preferred
• Good Speaking/Reading/Writing English is required.
• Good Computer (Ms. Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet, Email)
• Familiarity with SAP Software
• Strong Organization Skills
• Smart and be able work under pressure complete with deadline
• Flexible, confident and have sense urgency
• Strong time management skills
• Ability to think creatively and innovatively
• Professionalism, honesty, integrity teamwork.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
• Direct construction projects from conception to completion

• Familiarity with construction management software packages

• Have good command of spoken and written English.

Job Description: •	Ensures safe working in mechanical maintenance (is accountable).•	Ensures mechanical maintenance delivers on time in full (OTIF) and with the required quality •	Leads the mechanical maintenance according to Planned Maintenance Program.•	Drives asset performance and manages, monitors and analyses the maintenance costs.•	Responsible for Effectiveness of breakdown support teams (MTTR).•	Informs plant manager of major breakdowns.•	Responsible for the maintenance RCFA process.•	Hands over project deliverables to PM teams (troubleshooting guides).•	Defines and trains BDA, MSA (minor stops analysis), RCFA (5 why) methodology.•	Ensures warranties process is followed•	Approves procurement of parts and services (mechanical)•	Supports strategic supplier management and evaluation.•	Establish and execute the Long (3YP) and medium (annual overhauls) maintenance master plan.•	Supports and improves Predictive Maintenance.•	Accountable for performance and technical development (incl. performance reviews) of entire mechanical maintenance organization.•	Manages workforce and capacity in mechanical maintenance, including training and out/in sourcing.•	Aligns planned maintenance stoppage with production stakeholders i.e. brewing and packaging managers (and reports to Engineering manager/ Plant manager).•	Accountable for all interfaces within maintenance and between the maintenance department and other departments within the brewery.•	Represents Maintenance in the Production Meetings.•	Defines and drives the maintenance strategy; i.e. installing required foundation organization, setting up the strategic maintenance plan, establishing basic standards, restoring all equipment to basic condition •	Establishes the functional competency of the mechanical maintenance (and operations) team in the use of basic maintenance systems and tools.•	Implements the management system and ensures the SAP or other CMMS in functional and in place•	Governs asset- and spare parts master data (is accountable).•	Monitors the maintenance KPI dashboard and uses this to report and control the maintenance department.
Job Requirement: •	Education: Minimum Bachelor, preferably MSc degree in Mechanical Engineering and/or similar.•	Experiences:  a.	>4 years management experience, preferably in a technical/operational surrounding.b.	Proven track record in people management (getting things done within a group/team).c.	Ambassador for enabling a safe and quality controlled working environment (leads by example). d.	Minimum of 4 years experiences & knowledge of maintenance (engineering) and/or operations, also from a strategic point of view: ability to setup and drive (strategic) improvement initiatives and manage changes from the shop floor within the department.e.	Enabler to effectively work together between different directly related departments (i.e. procurement, operations, finance).•	Skills: a.	Focused on and experienced in managing and controlling the 6 core work processes within maintenance; i.e. workflow (maintenance job life cycle) management, maintenance engineering, materials & parts supply, inventory management, asset master data management and cost management.b.	Ample working experience with CMMS i.e. SAP and others. Ability to support, manage and coach the ME (master data owner) in properly setting up the required master data structure and preventive maintenance regime within the SAP system. c.	Experienced in conducting BDA-analysis and training other BDA facilitators; i.e. good training skills.d.	Excellent communication-, management-, facilitation- and reporting skills. e.	Ability to effectively show/visualize the added value of maintenance (foundation) activities in relation to improving maintenance performance (can explain the required strategy to the team and other departments and create buy-in). f.	Ample knowledge of TPM and (other) continuous improvement methods.

Job Description: • Manages and organizes asset master data, (preferably) within the SAP. Sets up the asset breakdown structure down to the required maintainable item level, and defines all PM tasks and inventory items in SAP according to the master data standards. Implements management system.• Monitors asset performance (OPI or line availability). Responsible for plant availability (uptime).• Introduces basic maintenance plans for all equipment  • Sets up basic spare part segmentation and define critical spares.• No change (MOC) or modification activities, only restore to basic condition activities.• Collects and manages asset drawings, documents, permits (licenses), and warranties.• Conducts Tagging if required or appropriate (e.g. calibration tags).• Supports sourcing strategy, i.e. sets up basic maintenance supplier agreements and/or SLA's.• Supports the Engineering manager to conduct the plan and execution of brewery CAPEX's.• Supports engineering manager (EM) in maintaining electrical & automation master plan.• Supports engineering manager (EM) and reports to the EM in initiating and driving the basic maintenance processes and restoring basic condition.• Feeds planning team leader and maintenance planner with preventive maintenance plans and plans to restore assets to basic condition.• Mentors and trains production technicians in restoring the basic conditions to the assets in their production zones.• Mentors and trains production technicians in executing breakdown analysis.• Performs loss & cost maintenance deployments to shop floor level and establishes PDCA process.• Assesses current equipment condition and develops restoration plan to eliminate sporadic loss.• Supports the improvement of basic standards for safety, process, and quality and ensures compliance.• Implements systematic breakdown analysis and reduction system (BDA).• Monitors impact of PM activities (MTBF, MTBS, MTBA, …) and supports countermeasures to improve preventive maintenance (PM) and autonomous maintenance (AM) roll-out.• Starts improvement on focus equipment to eliminate abnormalities and develops basic skills in maintenance and operating teams via training.• Key-user of the SAP. OPI (and other ME-) data registration in the SAP.• Maintains automation backup data (parameters, PLC, HMI, etc.).• Reports on maintenance KPIs, i.e. % assets restored to basic condition, nr. of breakdowns, % ABC analysis complete, OPI score and/or line performance, % PM plans OTIF, and % asset master data as built.
Job Requirement: • Education: Preferably Bachelor level in plant electrical & automation • Experiences: Minimum of 3 years in Plant electrical & automation and managing of people • Skills: General knowledge of maintenance engineering processes, i.e. have basic knowledge of cost driver and performance killer analysis, ABC criticality ranking, preventive maintenance, critical spare parts selection, item segmentation & inventory management, and asset performance management.• Good knowledge of maintenance operations and SAP (i.e. asset master data key-user and becoming/training for asset master data expert).• Excellent technical maintenance analysis- and reporting skills.• People management and leadership.• Facilitating skills/ability to organize and facilitate workshops for multidisciplinary teams.• TPM / Lean / 6 Sigma, etc.

Job Description:
- Define new data mart and collection based on business requirements.

- Collect, interpret data, and analyze results using statistical technique.

- Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statically efficiency and quality.

- Support initiatives for data integrity and normalization; support the maintenance of the 360 Customer View Data model, Customer Segmentation model and other data models in the DW.

- Support business analytics team in the development of statistical models and machine-learning algorithms and then present the result using data visualization techniques to business users.

- Analyze, prioritize and fix open issues to ensure timely resolution of issues affecting business applications.

- Work closely with EPM (Enterprise Performance Management) and business analytics team to determine business objective and goals.

- Provide an approach and solution to business analytic team.

- Develop, implement and document systems, internal methodology, processes and procedures for software development standards.

- Document database model, data metadata, data analytic design and machine-learning algorithm.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Management or related fields.

- Minimum 02 years’ experience in data mining or analytics with understanding of models, structures, theories, principles, and practices preferably in financial service industry.

- Experience in reporting or software development is a plus.

- Knowledge in data modeling tools, data preparation, processing, classification, and forecasting.

- Knowledge in Excel, Python/R, SQL, familiarity with business intelligence tool (PowerBI, Tableau...), Microsoft SQL Server, SSIS, SSRS and SSAS.

- High commitment and be a detail oriented with good interpersonal and problem solving skills.

- Good verbal and written communication in both Khmer and English.

job title: Assistant Manager- Asset and Cost Controller
position: Assistant Manager- Asset and Cost Controller
Job Description: The role of Asset Management comes with significant responsibility, and this should be articulated in Asset Management job description by listing some of the following duties and tasks:•	Manages and tracks whole asset of company  •	Creates asset master data into system by ensuing assignment to the correct cost center, asset Class, location, and depreciation method.•	Prints coding sticker to each physical asset •	Records Asset movement such as Asset transfer, return, scrape and disposal •	Checks and verify asset request and ensure an issuance asset to requestor following the requisition timely.•	Prepares daily/monthly report for asset management to manager when required•	Works with department head to perform asset count or spot check to ensure asset are located the right place and department. •	Reconciles daily/monthly/yearly GL accounts relating to Asset posting •	Perform/posts monthly asset depreciation and simulate all amount and GL before posting to accounting.  •	Maintains asset documentation and keep on the proper folder•	Assists to provide timely any asset duty to manager such as paying property tax, licenses, and other annual payment under asset management. •	Regularly communicates to asset owners to ensure they use asset in a proper way and taking care asset. •	Support Purchase team to calculate materials planned prices such as raw materials, packaging material and additive materials including purchase cost, inflation, exchange rate and logistic cost, from purchase order till good receipt plan. •	Supports Production team to identify manufacturing overhead cost such as labor cost, electricity and water consumption by production line and interpret them into cost. •	Sets up and allocates manufacturing overhead cost structure and assessment cycle into system to drill down to the semi and finish goods levels.•	Calculate standard activities types rate and maintain it in system on timely basis.  •	Release product costing into system and ensure semi and finish goods costing lots are updated and maintain with the correct profit center, date, and product hierarchy.•	Performs monthly actual product costing calculation and settlement based on production order complying with guidelines of month end check list.•	Closes production order from previous month after settlement and calculate actual production cost.•	Prepares and analyses standard Vs. actual cost, investigates the production variance and highlight significant variances including usage and price.•	Conduct inventory analysis on a monthly/quarterly basis and generate reports for management•	Assist Accountant with suggesting changes to policies or procedures to inventory management and physical count stock.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s Degree in accounting or relevant field, ACCA is a plus.•	At least 3 year of experience in accounting field or related field.•	Knowledge of finance and accounting•	Good in Microsoft Office, internet and email•	Good at in English and Khmer

Job Description:
* Operations

- Coordinate all Restaurant / Banquet / food production, and all specific duties to chefs and other staff under his/her supervision
- Check all set-ups for restaurant and banquet functions. - - Responsible for the correct timing during service and that food served is always of the highest standards
- Monitor and implement portion control established with the recipe cards and the butcher test; minimize waste and spoilage
- Check stores and refrigerators and oversee proper storage and recycling of leftovers
- Ensure effective communication among the kitchens and with other departments
- Work closely with receiving and storeroom to ensure received goods meet Hotel’s quality standards specifications
- Supervise food tasting sessions and guide chefs for new menu implementation
- Attend meetings with Executive Chef to discuss future business strategy and review ongoing action plan progress, and other departmental meetings as required
- Update menu recipe cards and menu planning for promotions
- Additional tasks as required by the General Manager


* Quality Standards

- Ensure consistency and highest quality in food taste, temperature and presentation 
- Ensure the quality and cleanliness of all food displays with maximum creativity

* Training/ Development

- Conduct staff training and on-the-job training on kitchen skills and new menu items
- Guide employee orientation for new hires
- Ensure staff adhere to hotel regulations re: fire, safety and emergency procedures

* Cost Control

- Maintain proper controls over purchase orders and requisitions
- Monitor monthly food inventory turnover and slow-moving items
- Ensure purchasing, receiving and all storage are efficiently handled
- Review food cost analysis on a daily basis to in line with budget and forecast

* Hygiene and Sanitation

- Follow HACCP guidelines and ensure that staff comply with HACCP guidelines
- Works closely with Chief Steward to monitor and ensure that all cleaning is properly conducted and according to schedule 

* Staffing / Human Relations

- Recommend promotions, transfers of staff to various outlets for Executive Chef approval
- Monitor staff schedules for the assigned outlets 
Conduct section / departmental meetings and staff daily briefings
- Manage staff appraisal process
- Responsible for proper efficiency and profitable functioning of the assigned F&B outlets
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 5 years experiences in an International Class Hotel 
- Knowledge of other languages and basic understanding of local language preferred
- Excellent leadership & supervisory skills with a “hands-on” approach
- Positive attitude and high energy level
- Motivator & self-starter, displays initiative & creativity
- Team player and team builder
- Flexible & adaptable to different working locations
- Finance knowledge
- Good in English language (speaking and writing)

Job Description:
- Provide a professional, advisory and executive support service to the General Manager to assist in meeting the strategic goals of the establishment.
- Oversee the smooth and efficient running of the operation of Finance department.
- Analyse business performance / KPI results, providing feedback to General Manager/Senior Management.
- Co-ordinate and prepare annual business plan and budgets including operating and capital expenditure budgets.
- Evaluate the impact of business decisions.

- Ensure the full compliance of Hotel Finance Policies & Procedures within the department and the hotel.
- Advice on strategies aimed at cost minimization and maximization of revenue opportunities.
- Financial forecasting and Projection
- Reviews all General Ledgers in departmental Profit and Loss Statement in Sun Systems.
- Co-ordinates and prepares Financial Statements including Profit and Loss Statement, Balance
Sheet and Statement of Cashflow on a monthly basis to meet reporting timetable.
- Reconciles Balance Sheet accounts as designated on a monthly basis.
- Reconciles all of Bank account on a monthly basis.
- Prepares monthly tax payment report and annual tax on return.
- Participates and coordinates with other departments within the hotel during physical Fixed Asset verification and count.
- Additional tasks as required by the General Manager
Job Requirement:
- University degree of Accounting and Finance.
- Minimum 4-5 years extensive relevant working experiences in hotel industry.
- Good common of English (speaking, reading, writing and listening).
- Computer literacy in office processing and accounting software, preferably Opera PMS, Micros POS, Materials Control and Sun Systems.
- Ability to communicate effectively and professionally with people at all levels.
-  Accurate and precise in figures.
- Good attitude and well groomed.
- Honesty, integrity, opened-mind and reliable.
-Willing to work long hours during month end and year end closing.
- Attitudes of high achiever, self-motivated, clear thinker and analytical.
- Temperament of calm, sociable, have sense of humour and adaptable.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
•	Perform and review monthly close period for trading business to ensure the completeness and accuracy of the data 
•	Perform financial analysis, strategic actions to ensure the decisions are made with the best interest for the Company.
•	Analyze the management information, investigate unusual variances, highlight key trends for the financial excellence
•	Act as the main contact person with other functional department to provide the insightful cause of variances, adverse trends and others financial-related tasks
•	Provide information to the business units such as Profit Center, Cost Center, General Ledger and Internal Order
•	Create Profit Center, Cost Center and Internal Order to fit with the business requirement 
•	Control the actual performance expenses to align with the budget
•	Collaborate with internal stakeholders and act as a financial business partner 
•	Take part in IT-related projects such as Power BI and other automated projects
•	Perform other tasks as assigned
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting and Finance or a related field. Master’s degree in Finance or ACCA is preferred.
•	At least 3 years of experience in Management Accounting and/or Finance, or a related area.
•	Knowledge in financial analysis 
•	Knowledge in business analysis, business modelling and strategic planning
•	Knowledge of SAP System and CO-Module is preferred
•	Advanced level in Excel and PowerPoint and Power BI is preferred
•	Presentation, communications, and reporting skills
•	Interpersonal skills
•	Analytical skills and logical thinking skills
•	Problem Solving Skills
•	Relationship Management Skills
•	Ability to work under pressure and work overtime during month end.
•	Ability to lead teamwork during no manager. 
•	Market visit with MBI team or sales team
•	Flexible to travel for supporting the retail drive.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To act as a role model for the management of the store team.
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To To participate in the recruitment of personnel in an active and optimal manner.
• To ensure the development of the team towards a high level of knowledge and performance.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To detect the potential of each employee and ensure their development.
• To ensure the optimal management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• To lead the team and correctly and actively manage potential conflict.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To plan the required measures to reach targets.
• To analyze and review management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• To priorities and, during busy periods, dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To ensure the correct execution of administrative tasks.
• To review and apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.).
• To ensure strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To optimize resources and try to minimize expenses e.g. optimization of the workforce, suppliers, etc.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.)
• To ensure and collaborate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To optimise selling space in order to obtain maximum profitability.
• To continuously ensure the correct replenishment of the store.
• To ensure compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Analysis of management indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register program and Pathfinder operation.
• E Leadership qualities – mobilizes and motivates the team.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organization, management and planning.
• Able to analyze and offer solutions.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Prioritization – optimal use of time.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Attachments
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall (Phnom Penh) N/A

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Job Description:
•  Monitor instructional and managerial processes to ensure that program activities are related to program outcomes and use findings to take corrective actions.
•  Regularly consult the campus-level committee about planning, operation, supervision, and evaluation of campus education program. Include students and community representatives when appropriate.
•  Provide instructional resources and materials to support teaching staff in accomplishing instructional goals.
•  Provide for two-way communication with superintendent, staff, students, parents, and community.
•  Communicate and promote expectations for high-level performance to staff and students. Recognize excellence and achievement.
•  Ensure the effective and quick resolution of conflicts.
•  Build common vision for school improvement with staff. Direct planning activities and put programs in place with staff to ensure attainment of school’s mission.
•  Identify, analyze, and apply research findings (e.g., effective school correlates) to promote school improvement. 
•  Develop and set annual campus performance objectives for each of the Academic Excellence Indicators using the campus planning process and site-based decision making committee.
•  Develop, maintain, and use information systems and records necessary to show campus progress on performance objectives addressing each Academic Excellence Indicator.
•  Performed other tasks assigned by management
Job Requirement:
•  Master’s or Bachelor’s in Business Administration or related fields.
•  Three years experiences as a classroom teacher with additional experience in instructional leadership roles.
•  Working knowledge of curriculum and instruction. 
•  Ability to evaluate instructional program and teaching effectiveness and to manage budget and personnel Ability to coordinate campus functions.
•  Ability to implement policy and procedures and ability to interpret data. 
•  Strong organizational, communication, public relations and interpersonal skills. 
How to Apply
Competitive salary and please state your salary expectation! Company Profile:
Five Star Furniture is occupied with the design, manufacturing, delivery and installation of custom-made furniture. The furniture manufactured is of an individual design in accordance with the requirements and preferences of the customers, as well as with the space and interior options of the premises for which it is designed for. We are able to furnish all types of rooms from kitchens to bedrooms, living rooms, dinning suites and office furniture for flat house, villa, apartment, condominium, hotel, school, office…etc.
Currently we are seeking for talents to join our team and grow the business together.

Job Description:

•	database software in performance of assigned duties.
